data.title: CRI Group
data.meta_description: CRI Group | 17.020 pengikut di LinkedIn. Commitment, Reliability, and Innovation - values that have built us since 1960. | C.R.I. has been pumping trust worldwide since 1961, and we are revolutionizing the irrigation sector with equipment that yields maximum output. Now, we are a multi-winged organization that produces pumps, motors, valves, pipes, and more, with a strong presence in fluid management systems. We offer over 9,000+ products catering to various industries and have a foothold in 120+ countries with 15 wholly owned subsidiaries.
data.text:
Experience the profound impact of CRI Pumps through compelling stories that underscore our steadfast dedication to excellence in pumping solutions and sustainability. At CRI Pumps, every success story exemplifies our unyielding commitment to delivering cutting-edge and sustainable pumping solutions that empower industries, agriculture, businesses, and communities toward a brighter and sustainable future. In this edition, let's uncover how CRI pumps enhanced water supply efficiency for the Tamil Nadu Water Supply and Drainage Board. #CRIsuccessstories #CRIgroup #CRIpumps #splitcasepumps #energyefficientpumps

Ensuring the reliability and efficiency of pumps is critical across all industries. However, many still rely on reactive maintenance, addressing issues only after they have caused downtime or damage. It's time to consider the significant advantages of proactive problem detection to enable timely interventions and preventive measures. In this newsletter, we will delve into how Electrical Signature Analysis (ESA) can revolutionize your maintenance strategy by providing insights that enhance pump performance and extend its operational lifespan. #electricalsignatureanalysis #proactivemaintenance #pumpmotors #pumpefficiency #pumpreliability #CRIgroup #CRIpumps

Engineered Solutions for Waste Water Management! Our latest article on the pivotal role of pumping systems in wastewater management is now featured in the World Pumps Magazine July-August 2024 Issue! Dive into the insights on how C.R.I. Pumps is leading the way with cutting-edge solutions for sewage handling, wastewater transfer, treatment, and reuse. https://lnkd.in/gE3gr6gb #WastewaterManagement #FluidManagement #Innovation #Sustainability #WorldPumpsMagazine #CRIPumps #CRIfluidsystems #CRIgroup

Come and be a part of C.R.I. at Fire and Safety India Expo 2024. Experience our extensive array of cutting-edge technologies that drive the fire safety and building automation needs of modern India. #CRIExpo2024 #FireAndSafetyIndia #BuildingAutomation #FireSafetyTech #ModernIndia #InnovationInSafety #CuttingEdgeTech #SmartBuildingSolutions #FireProtection #SafetyFirst #IndiaExpo #FireSafetyInnovation #TechForSafety #SafetyExpo2024 #BuildingSafety

Join our Dynamic International Team and Elevate Your Career in International Marketing! Role: Assistant Manager - Marketing (International Division) Are you a seasoned marketing professional eager to advance your career? Do you have a passion for international markets and excel in crafting innovative marketing and sales strategies? Are you detail-oriented and results-driven? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you! Apply now by sending your resume to cri@crifluidsystems.com #jobopenings #marketingjobs #jobsinpumpindustry #internationalmarketing #crigroup #cripumps #crifluidsystems
